selections.name: Martist
selections.reason: Stablemate to the scratched favorite. Trialled superbly behind that horse and the Gollan/Maloney combination is lethal with juveniles.

selections.name: Doubtwilly
selections.reason: Professional debut winner at Sunshine Coast. Has race experience over many of these and draws well.

selections.name: Girmay
selections.reason: Jack Bruce trained colt who won a trial at this track recently. Market watch essential.

selections.name: High Authority
selections.reason: Solid 2nd on debut at Eagle Farm. Will take improvement from that run.

danger_horse.name: Doubtwilly
danger_horse.reason: Race experience is a significant advantage in 2yo races.

selections.name: Akkadian Emperor
selections.reason: Waller/Harley combination. Hit the line hard for 3rd at Eagle Farm last start. Looks perfectly primed 3rd up to tackle this distance.

selections.name: Prince Levi
selections.reason: Last start winner at this track/distance. Carries weight well and maintains form.

selections.name: Kureder
selections.reason: Waller runner bringing Sydney form (4th at Warwick Farm). Drops in class and maps well.

selections.name: Enterprise Private
selections.reason: Honest stayer who beat Prince Levi two starts back. Inside draw helps.

danger_horse.name: Prince Levi
danger_horse.reason: Proven winner at the trip and track.

selections.name: Berezka
selections.reason: Maher stable visitor with solid Sydney form (3rd at Canterbury). Class edge over local Class 1 field despite the wide draw.

selections.name: The Stars
selections.reason: Waller/Thornton. Good 3rd here last start. Draws the rails and should get a soft run.

selections.name: Dark Arts
selections.reason: Gollan runner resuming. Won a recent trial and has ability when right.

selections.name: Fireforce
selections.reason: Consistent type who ran 2nd at this track/distance last start.

danger_horse.name: The Stars
danger_horse.reason: Perfect barrier draw and Waller polish.

selections.name: The Wheelbarrow
selections.reason: Won well at this track/distance last start in the wet. Progressive type who draws perfectly to repeat.

selections.name: Canara
selections.reason: Waller runner dropping from Melbourne metro grade. Class suits but barrier is tricky.

selections.name: Headhunter
selections.reason: Forgive last start 6th; won well prior. Hoysted stable is firing.

selections.name: Italian Dancer
selections.reason: Chasing a hat-trick after wins at Sunshine Coast and Rockhampton. In career best form.

danger_horse.name: Canara
danger_horse.reason: Significant class drop from southern states.

selections.name: Fabulantes
selections.reason: Defeated key rivals here last start. Carries weight but is the class runner of the field.

selections.name: Quickzou
selections.reason: Gollan improver who won maiden with authority. Looks capable of the step up.

selections.name: Shredded
selections.reason: Dunn stable is flying. Horse has won two in a row and draws softly.

selections.name: Certified Copy
selections.reason: Finished close 3rd to Fabulantes last time. Meets him better at the weights.

selections.name: Time Of My Life
selections.reason: Last start winner at this track. Gollan/Jones combo. Draws well to be competitive again.

selections.name: Scud
selections.reason: Consistent mare who ran 4th here last start. Gets Ryan Maloney and a low draw.

selections.name: Carravilla
selections.reason: Just missed last start at Eagle Farm. Munce stable going well.

selections.name: Nightcapped
selections.reason: Last start winner at Sunshine Coast. Gets the rails run.

selections.name: Moravia
selections.reason: Freedman raider who won at Eagle Farm last start. Looks a class above this field despite the wide gate.

selections.name: Abender
selections.reason: Gollan/Maloney. Won at this track last start. Main danger.

selections.name: Scripted
selections.reason: Ran in the Magic Millions Guineas. Massive class drop here.

selections.name: Dominant Darcy
selections.reason: Won well at this track last start. In form.

danger_horse.name: Abender
danger_horse.reason: Track specialist from top local stable.

selections.name: Chief In Charge
selections.reason: Won at this track/distance last start. Hoysted/Thornton. Draws perfectly.

selections.name: Boom Shot
selections.reason: Gollan runner who placed here last start. Consistent and draws well.

selections.name: Barrelling
selections.reason: Another Gollan runner. 4th last start. Inside gate gives options.

selections.name: Mean Approach
selections.reason: Ryan Maloney takes the ride. Can improve on recent form.

danger_horse.name: Boom Shot
danger_horse.reason: Consistent form lines and top stable.

selections.name: Make A Call
selections.reason: Won well at this track last start. Gollan/Jones. Looks the one to beat.

selections.name: Bengal Diamond
selections.reason: Defeated Rock Hard Love here last start. Holding form well.

selections.name: Pierata's Gem
selections.reason: Consistent type. 2nd at Doomben last start. Good draw.

selections.name: Rock Hard Love
selections.reason: Runner-up to Bengal Diamond. Weight swing might help turn tables.

danger_horse.name: Bengal Diamond
danger_horse.reason: Proven winner at this level recently.

selections.name: Fleetwood
selections.reason: Gollan/Maloney from Barrier 1. 3rd in BM90 grade last start. This is easier. Looks the winner.

selections.name: Zoubaby
selections.reason: Last start winner at this track. Light weight and in form.

selections.name: Colourful Emperor
selections.reason: Ryan/Alexiou Sydney runner. Watch betting moves closely.

selections.name: Zondee
selections.reason: Resuming. Has quality and trialled well.

danger_horse.name: Zoubaby
danger_horse.reason: Winning form is hard to knock.

exotic_strategy.strategy: Win Bet #1 (Best Bet of the Day). Exacta 1 / 8,9,13.
